original_text: Leaves will start to grow on the stick of the man that I have chosen as priest. In that way I will stop the bad words that the Israelites are always saying against you.’
korean_text: 내가 택한 자의 지팡이에는 싹이 나리니 이것으로 이스라엘 자손이 너희에게 대하여 원망하는 말을 내 앞에서 그치게 하리라

sentences.original_text: Leaves will start to grow on the stick
of the man that I have chosen as priest
In that way I will stop the bad words
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 방식으로 나는 나쁜 말들을 멈출 것이다

sentences.original_text: that the Israelites are always saying against you
